text: @CNNPolitics @realDonaldTrump Admins is not formulating a long term plan to punish China! No! Not at all! The reality is that @CNN every hours counting figures of Covid-19 deaths in US & World but did not want to know Why "Wuhan Lab made epicenter of Covid-19 during US China Tariffs Combat?
